name: Cooking Crescendo
description:
Every dish a song!

In this game you're a ghost just trying to make the house you're haunting a happier place, and what better way of doing so other than cooking!  the family will be delighted to find nice hand made dinner every night on their table..... right?

Cooking crescendo is a rhythm game where you make delicious dishes by just following the beat, so don't lose your focus and you'll make your family happy again.

This game was done in the time restriction of the rhythm game jam, thanks for your support!
